results.content: A lot of information here. Covered a little faster than I would have liked. So, I will review the course again.

response.content:
Hi Charles,
Thank you for the review and of course for subscribing to the Gutenberg Editor training.
Just a quick reminder that this course is regularly updated. With every new release WordPress puts out, I'll have an update that day or a few days later.
Oh and you do have lifetime access so there is that ;-)

- Steve D.

results.content: Great instructor.  I love that the lesson is broken down to micro lessons.  This is much easier to follow and learn the different sections.
results.content_html: Great instructor. I love that the lesson is broken down to micro lessons. This is much easier to follow and learn the different sections.

results.content: Great course i would love to see it updated to the newest version of Gutenberg (and its done !!! One week after i wrote this review the author updated it and even added two lessons) but still in this version i learned a lot i did not know. All lectures are easy to understand and cover all whats needed to know about Gutenberg  in the last version. And the quick update shows even more how good it is.

response.content: Hey there Susanne, thank you very much for taking the time to not only post your review for the WordPress Gutenberg course but also for that much appreciated 5 Star rating!! Thank you. - Steve D.
